Recommend Your Friends

If you love us,  tell your friends and get 25% off your next cut and style for you and your friends.

At the end of your  appointment, you will receive a Recommend a Friend card. We would love you to recommend a friend who has not visited us before. When you do, your friend will receive 25% off their cut & blow dry appointment and as a thank you, you will also receive 25% off your next cut & blow dry.

 

Enquire now

Join Our Loyalty Club

The Style Lounge loyalty card is our way of saying thank you to you!  Build points and receive complimentary services and discounts!

It's totally free to join once you have one you use it to collect points every time you visit the salon! You get points for every service you have and every product you buy.
